column1: Florida medical examiners were releasing coronavirus death data. The state made them stop

Corona Virus testing is FREE. If it is NOT Free in your area, you may have been misdirected in locating a real testing site, or there is possible FRAUD where 'testing' is happening. Look 4 your STATE Health Dept 'Testing Sites' from Gov website on Corona https://www.cdc.gov/publichealthgateway/healthdirectories/healthdepartments.html
